home.title: Alternative weddings
home.subtitle: A new wedding concept to change everything.

firstCard.title: Bendito Bodorrio
firstCard.text: Bendito Bodorrio is a company focused on providing a service that seeks to provide a unique and groundbreaking wedding experience, dissociating itself from the traditional and religious conception of them. This service is aimed at couples who want a wedding that reflects their personality and ideals, in which their fundamental rights are respected and diversity is encouraged.
